thread.title: Calling All Families: Innovative New Guidebook Takes You Inside New York City
thread.title_full: Calling All Families: Innovative New Guidebook Takes You Inside New York City

title: Calling All Families: Innovative New Guidebook Takes You Inside New York City
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Calling All Families: Innovative New Guidebook Takes You Inside New York City "New York City for Families: 5 Boroughs in 7 Days" is a new guidebook from the team at RealFamilyTrips.com. It features an out of the box itinerary, alternate activities for day trips and/or customization, and original historical fiction for kids. TEANECK, NJ, August 26,   RealFamilyTrips.com, a family to family travel planning and resource site, has just released an exciting new book called "New York City for Families: 5 Boroughs in 7 Days." The website that believes travel should be fun and engaging, while also promoting family growth, has provided a detailed guide to NYC that is unlike any guidebook you have ever encountered. The book takes the hassle out of planning a vacation by doing the work for you. The pre-planned trip works right "out of the box" and exposes families to all 5 boroughs of New York City as they tour. Enjoy a mix of popular sights and little known gems - all accompanied by comprehensive details, important context, as well as tips & tricks. The extensive selection of alternate activities expand on the main itinerary, giving any family options to customize their experience just for them. Make the trip more or less active, and enhance opportunities for education or fun by selecting from this expansive section. These alternate activities also make the book a valuable resource for native New Yorkers or those who live nearby, as they can be taken as "a la carte" day trips. Enjoy any of the book's activities on their own to experience new and exciting parts of the city. Finally, original historical fiction for children takes them inside the rich history of New York City. Learn about the locations enjoyed on the main itinerary, and everything from the Revolutionary War to George Washington's first inauguration. Featuring characters just like them, children will enjoy getting excited about their trip and becoming experts on the city while reading fun stories full of whimsy and excitement. The book is available for purchase today. eBook formats that work on nearly any device are available for $5.99, and paperback copies sell for just $15.99. Visit RealFamilyTrips.com (http://realfamilytrips.com/spotlight-on-our-new-book-new-york-city-for-families/) for more about the book, as well as links to purchase on Amazon and other sites. This is the follow up to the Amazon #1 new release in Israel travel guides, "Israel for Families: An Adventure in 12 Days." This first release from the website offers all the same great features for a vacation that spans the entire nation of Israel and offers amazing opportunities for family growth. Visit RealFamilyTrips.com for more information on the book, and to explore all the family offerings for travel. # # #
